DataElement.preferredName: CHAMPS Activities Questionnaire for Older Adults 41.1 During Past 4 Weeks Other Physical Activity Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's description of other types of physical activity not previously mentioned, during the past 4 weeks.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: CHAMPS Activities Questionnaire for Older Adults During Past 4 Weeks Other Physical Activity
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A self-report physical activity questionnaire for older men and women, developed to evaluate the outcomes of the Community Healthy Activities Model Program for Seniors (CHAMPS), an intervention to increase physical activity._At some point in a given period of time._A period of time consisting of the 28 days before the present._A physical activity not elsewhere listed or specified.

ClassificationSchemes.longName: CHAMPS (Community Healthy Activities Model Program: Physical Activities Questionnaire for Older Adults)

ReferenceDocuments.name: Using PRO/HRQoL Measures
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is part of a full set of items that comprise a PRO/HRQoL measure. The full set must be used without any changes to the questions or value set in order to retain the validity and reliability associated with the measure. Changes may not be made to these documents. In cases where retaining the question set intact to preserve the validity and reliability are not as important as advancing the science, questions may be used individually or in combination with other measure questions.

DataElement.origin: CHAMPS Activities Questionnaire for Older Adults
